seg-source.mrk: Signavio Customer Support
Signavio Customer Support
Configuring Signavio Process Manager

target.mrk: Den Signavio Process Manager konfigurieren

trans-unit.source: Before you can start the web application, you need to configure the Signavio Server. The ZIP archive contains the configuration blueprint <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd>. Place this file together with the Signavio Process Manager license file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration_signed.xml</kbd> and the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">simulation.xml</kbd> file into the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf</kbd>. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR</kbd> denotes the root directory of your Tomcat instance.

seg-source.mrk: Before you can start the web application, you need to configure the Signavio Server.
The ZIP archive contains the configuration blueprint <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd>.

Place this file together with the Signavio Process Manager license file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration_signed.xml</kbd> and the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">simulation.xml</kbd> file into the directory <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR/conf</kbd>.
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$TOMCAT_DIR</kbd> denotes the root directory of your Tomcat instance.

target.mrk: Bevor Sie die Anwendung starten, ist es notwendig, den Signavio Anwendungsserver zu konfigurieren.

trans-unit.source: Then, adjust the following properties in the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd> file:

seg-source.mrk: Then, adjust the following properties in the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">configuration.xml</kbd> file:
server

target.mrk: Server

trans-unit.source: The URL of the target server. It must not end with a <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/</kbd> (slash).

seg-source.mrk: The URL of the target server.
It must not end with a <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/</kbd> (slash).

target.mrk: Die URL des Ziel-Servers.

seg-source.mrk: Format: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http(s)://<DNS entry or IP address>(:<port>) </kbd>
Examples: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://signavio.mycompany.com</kbd>, <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://159.234.37.47:8080</kbd>
defaultLanguageCode

target.mrk: defaultLanguageCode

trans-unit.source: The default language of the system. When working in a multi language workspace the value defines the default language. E.g. if a user is invited to comment on a model, the Collaboration Hub will be displayed in the default language. Once the user logs in, the Collaboration Hub is displayed in the language defined in the user settings.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />Possible values are the following:

seg-source.mrk: The default language of the system.
When working in a multi language workspace the value defines the default language.
E.g.
if a user is invited to comment on a model, the Collaboration Hub will be displayed in the default language.
Once the user logs in, the Collaboration Hub is displayed in the language defined in the user settings.
Possible values are the following:

target.mrk: Die Standardsprache des Systems.
z.B.

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">de</kbd> (German)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">en</kbd> (English)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">es</kbd> (Spanish)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">fr</kbd> (French)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ja</kbd> (Japanese)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ko</kbd> (Korean)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">nl</kbd> (Dutch)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">ru</kbd> (Russian)
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">zh</kbd> (Chinese)
externalconfigurationpath

target.mrk: externalconfigurationpath

trans-unit.source: The absolute path to an existing folder on the target server. The system user who runs the Tomcat Server needs to have write access to this directory. The path must be outside of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory, because during an update of Signavio Process Manager the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> folder is removed. This folder contains files that are cached during run-time of the application. You don't need to backup the content of this folder.

seg-source.mrk: The absolute path to an existing folder on the target server.
The system user who runs the Tomcat Server needs to have write access to this directory.

The path must be outside of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> directory, because during an update of Signavio Process Manager the content of the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">webapps</kbd> folder is removed.
This folder contains files that are cached during run-time of the application.
You don't need to backup the content of this folder.

target.mrk: Der absolute Pfad zu einem vorhandenen Ordner auf dem Zielserver.
Der Systemnutzer, der den Tomcat-Server ausführt, muss Schreibzugriff auf dieses Verzeichnis haben.
Dieser Ordner enthält Dateien, die zur Laufzeit der Anwendung zwischengespeichert werden.
Sie müssen den Inhalt dieses Ordners nicht sichern.

seg-source.mrk: Database configuration

target.mrk: Datenbankkonfiguration:

trans-unit.source: The template configuration file already contains a default configuration for the connection to a MySQL, Oracle and MS SQL server database. Please use those defaults and configure the variables URL, user name and password.

seg-source.mrk: The template configuration file already contains a default configuration for the connection to a MySQL, Oracle and MS SQL server database.
Please use those defaults and configure the variables URL, user name and password.

target.mrk: In der Vorlage der Konfigurationsdatei finden Sie bereits Vorgaben für die Anbindung einer MySQL, Oracle und MS SQL Server-Datenbank.
Bitte verwenden Sie diese Vorgaben und konfigurieren Sie die Variablen URL, Benutzername und Passwort.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">driverClass</kbd>: The Java class name of the JDBC driver.

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">driverClass</kbd>: The Java class name of the JDBC driver.
Possible values are:

target.mrk: Mögliche Werte sind:

seg-source.mrk: MySQL: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
Oracle 11, 12: oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
MS SQL Server : com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">url</kbd>: The URL of the database system

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">url</kbd>: The URL of the database system
Examples:

target.mrk: Beispiele:

seg-source.mrk: MySQL : jdbc:mysql://localhost/platform
MS SQL Server : jdbc:sqlserver://localhost;databaseName=signavio;

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">username </kbd>: The username of the database user account.

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">username </kbd>: The username of the database user account.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">password</kbd>: The password of the database user account.

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">password</kbd>: The password of the database user account.
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">dialect</kbd>: Hibernate specific SQL dialect.
Possible values are:

target.mrk: Mögliche Werte sind:

seg-source.mrk: MySQL : org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect
Oracle : org.hibernate.dialect.Oracle10gDialect
MS SQL Server : com.signavio.hibernate.dialect.CustomSQLServerDialect
Email server configuration

trans-unit.source: Configure the connection to an email sever that will send out system emails like notifications and registration emails.

seg-source.mrk: Configure the connection to an email sever that will send out system emails like notifications and registration emails.

target.mrk: Konfigurieren Sie die Verbindungzu einem E-Mail-Server, der System-E-Mails, wie Benachrichtigungen und Registrierungs-E-Mails, versendet.

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_HOST_NAME </kbd>: Host name of the email server

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_HOST_NAME </kbd>: Host name of the email server

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMPT_EMAIL</kbd>: Sender mail addresses for outgoing emails

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMPT_EMAIL</kbd>: Sender mail addresses for outgoing emails

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_AUTH_USER </kbd>: Username of the email account to be used

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_AUTH_USER </kbd>: Username of the email account to be used

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_AUTH_PWD</kbd>: Password of the email account to be used

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_AUTH_PWD</kbd>: Password of the email account to be used
<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_PORT</kbd>: Port the email server uses

trans-unit.source: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_SECURE</kbd>: Usage of TLS/SSL. Possible values are <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">false</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">SMTP_SECURE</kbd>: Usage of TLS/SSL.
Possible values are <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">true</kbd> and <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">false</kbd>
Optional configurations

trans-unit.source: Support email address (optional): <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />This is the receiving address of the support request users can send through the support form out of Signavio Process Manager. If this attribute is empty, the Signavio support address will be used. Please insert the email address of your contact person, for example <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><supportMailAddress>support@signavio.com</supportMailAddress></kbd>.

seg-source.mrk: Support email address (optional): <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
This is the receiving address of the support request users can send through the support form out of Signavio Process Manager.
If this attribute is empty, the Signavio support address will be used.
Please insert the email address of your contact person, for example <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><supportMailAddress>support@signavio.com</supportMailAddress></kbd>.

target.mrk: Dies ist die Empfangsadresse der Support-Anfragen, die Nutzer über das Support-Formular aus Signavio Process Manager heraus senden können.
Wenn dieses Attribut leer ist, wird die Signavio-Supportadresse verwendet.

trans-unit.source: Maximum diagram count for reports configuration (optional): <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /> Insert the following line: <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><maxDiagramCount>500</maxDiagramCount> </kbd> <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /> In this example, the value is increased to a maximum of 500 diagrams. The default value is 250.

seg-source.mrk: Maximum diagram count for reports configuration (optional): <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />

Insert the following line: <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><maxDiagramCount>500</maxDiagramCount> </kbd> <br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" />
In this example, the value is increased to a maximum of 500 diagrams.
The default value is 250.

target.mrk: In diesem Beispiel wird der Wert auf maximal 500 Diagramme angehoben.
Der Standardwert ist 250.

trans-unit.source:
Performance related configuration (optional)
1000: The default value is 1000. Use a lower number if the system uses too much main memory (RAM). Use a higher number if the system is too slow.
172800: The default value is 172800 (in seconds). Use a lower number if the system uses too much main memory (RAM). Use a higher number if the system is too slow.
If you need more advice, contact the Signavio Customer Support.

seg-source.mrk: Performance related configuration (optional)<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><inMemoryCacheMaxEntries>1000</inMemoryCacheMaxEntries></kbd>: The default value is 1000.
Use a lower number if the system uses too much main memory (RAM).

Use a higher number if the system is too slow.<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" /><kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><inMemoryCacheExpirationTimeAfterAccess>172800</inMemoryCacheExpirationTimeAfterAccess></kbd>: The default value is 172800 (in seconds).
Use a lower number if the system uses too much main memory (RAM).
Use a higher number if the system is too slow.
If you need more advice, contact the Signavio Customer Support.

trans-unit.source: In the same directory, add the following lines between the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><Context></kbd> tag to the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">context.xml</kbd>:

seg-source.mrk: In the same directory, add the following lines between the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><Context></kbd> tag to the file <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">context.xml</kbd>:

trans-unit.source: The location of the configuration files changed with version 9.7.0. Follow the instruction in the <MadCap:xref href="../update.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Updating Signavio Process Manager </MadCap:xref>section to move the files to the new location.

seg-source.mrk: The location of the configuration files changed with version 9.7.0.

Follow the instruction in the <MadCap:xref href="../update.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Updating Signavio Process Manager </MadCap:xref>section to move the files to the new location.

target.mrk: Der Pfad, unter dem die Konfigurationsdateien abgelegt werden, hat sich mit Version 9.7.0 geändert.

alt-trans.seg-source: Follow <MadCap:xref href="../update.htm#Mo" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> this instruction </MadCap:xref> to move the files to the new location.
alt-trans.target: Folgen Sie den Anweisungen in , um die Dateien zu verschieben.<MadCap:xref href="../update.htm#Mo" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> this instruction </MadCap:xref>

trans-unit.source: Check if the system user that runs the Tomcat has access to newly copied files. If this is not the case, update the corresponding permissions accordingly.

seg-source.mrk: Check if the system user that runs the Tomcat has access to newly copied files.
If this is not the case, update the corresponding permissions accordingly.

target.mrk: Überprüfen Sie, ob der Systemnutzer, der den Tomcat ausführt, Zugriff auf die soeben kopierten Dateien hat.
Falls dies nicht der Fall ist, passen Sie die entsprechenden Berechtigungen an.

seg-source.mrk: Now, start the Tomcat server.

target.mrk: Starten Sie den Tomcat-Server.

trans-unit.source: You can now access Signavio Process Manager in a web browser via the DNS entry or the IP address configured (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://signavio.yourcompany.com</kbd>).

seg-source.mrk: You can now access Signavio Process Manager in a web browser via the DNS entry or the IP address configured (e.g. <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">http://signavio.yourcompany.com</kbd>).

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the configuration later, you need to restart the Tomcat server to apply these changes.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to change the configuration later, you need to restart the Tomcat server to apply these changes.

target.mrk: Falls Sie zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt Änderungen an der Konfiguration vornehmen, müssen Sie den Tomcat-Server neu starten, um die Änderungen zu übernehmen.

trans-unit.source: Signavio provides customers of the On-premises Edition automatically with a new license once the old one expires.

seg-source.mrk: Signavio provides customers of the On-premises Edition automatically with a new license once the old one expires.
